Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Janet A. Akers
Reviews.Content: We needed to extend some of our security surveillance camera systems and these worked perfectly for what we needed and at an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: No surprises
Reviews.Author: Wayne Johnson "Wayne"
Reviews.Content: I needed cables for my home security system cameras. Local stores had them, but at a price I considered outrageous. I turned to Amazon, and bought them for less than half the local prices. They arrived ahead of schedule, and were exactly what I needed. Perfect!

Reviews.Title: Security Camera Cable
Reviews.Author: kip714
Reviews.Content: VideoSecu 4 X 100 Feet Power Video CCTV Security Camera Cable with Free BNC RCA Cable Connectors 1JM. Received product as advertised. Prompt shipping.

ProductInfo.Features:
All-in-one video and power cables kit. Transmit video signal and supply DC power for security camera
Output type BNC video connector & 2.1mm power connectors
Every Video Power cable has BNC connectors and includes RCA/BNC adapters
Package Includes:8 x 150ft video power cables and 16 x BNC/RCA adaptors
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8 Pack 150ft BNC CCTV Video Power Cables CCD Security Camera DVR Wires Cords for Home Surveillance System with bonus Adaptors 1QX
